Powerscript API¶

PowerScript is the development environment of the system, which enables you to develop add ons, user exits, stand alone scripts or complex applications based on or integrated with the CONTACT Elements Platform. This document only describes some API members that are important for the cs.powerreports package. Most of the PowerReports API is closely bound to the OfficeLink API and thus described in the OfficeLink user manual.

    • WithPowerReports
